# isHostTimeValid

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the host time value is valid.

## Declaration

```swift
var isHostTimeValid: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioTime/hostTime] property is valid; otherwise, it returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Manipulating Host Time

- **hostTime**: The host time.
- **hostTime(forSeconds:)**: Converts seconds to host time.
- **seconds(forHostTime:)**: Converts host time to seconds.
